Edges-Vampire -- Male Human Legendary Vampire
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Gorge: Draining a human of blood gives +1 Strength Step and +1 Vigor Step for 1 hr 1/dy
Strength Of The Damned: +2 Strength Step and +2 Vigor Step when turned
Skills (20 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d8 Notice: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Skill Notes: Claws (Climbing): +2 Athletics (climbing)
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 20; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (12 points): Animal Form; Charm; Children Of The Night; Claws; Daywalker; Gorge; Mist Form; Regeneration (Fast); Sire; Thrall; Vampire; Wall Walker Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Feed: Has Habit+ feature
Vampire: Has Ageless, Bite, Darkvision, Feed, Rage, Regeneration (Slow), Strength Of The Damned, Undead, and Weakness features
Ageless: Does not age
Animal Form: Successful Smarts-2 allows transformation to or from a wolf or bat
Darkvision: R10" Ignores illumination penalties and 2 points from invisibility
Daywalker: Not harmed by sunlight
Habit+: Has a dangerous physical or mental addiction
Mist Form: Successful Smarts-2 allows transformation into mist 1/night; failure inflicts Fatigue (crit prevents retry)
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Sire: d4-hr process transforms target into a vampire (Healing w/Neutralize Disease neg)
Thrall: Has 1 devoted heroic servant
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Weakness: Suffers negative effects from particular objects or situations
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Bite (d8+d4); Chainsaw (2d6+4); Claws (d8+d6); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Undead: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Regeneration (Fast): Successful healing removes incapacitation or restores 1 Wound (Raise 2 Wounds) not caused by decapitation, holy water or weapons, sunlight, or a stake throught the heart 1/rd
Regeneration (Slow): May attempt a natural healing roll 1/dy
Undead-1: +2 Shaken recovery/Takes no additional damage from a Called Shot/Ignores 1 point of Wound penalties/Doesn't breathe/Immune to disease and poison
Wall Walker: May move 3" on vertical surfaces and 3" on inverted
Arcana
Arcana Notes:
Charm: Successful Persuasion plus spending a Benny allows use of Puppet effects on an unwary target for 1 dy
Children Of The Night: May summon 1 dire wolf, 1d4 normal wolves, or a medium swarm of bats or rats 1/night
